'''Tredwill''' was an elderly [[Pre-Númenóreans|Southlander]] of [[Tirharad]] in the [[Mordor|Southlands]] of [[Middle-earth]]. Tredwill was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' television series by [[Amazon Studios]], where he was portrayed by [[Peter Tait]].
